name: Alien Genocide
overview: The heavy cruiser Grant has become infeste4d by a horde of aliens that have no tolerance of humans. They have killed all crew members on board and we can no longer ignore their threat to our space ways. For this reason the aliens must be exterminated. It is your task to enter the heavy cruiser 'Grant' and destroy all life left aboard. This is a fast, fun crosshairs shooter from Craig Burfitt.
